text: Ivarkal (tankal vittil) iruntu konte (poril irantupona) tankal cakotararkalaip parri ‘‘avarkalum enkalaip pinparri iruntal (porukkuc cenru ippati) kollappattirukka mattarkal'' enrum kurinarkal. (Akave, napiye!) Kuruviraka: ‘‘Ninkal unmai colpavarkalaka iruntal (avarkalai enna, mutalil!) Ninkal unkalai vittu maranattait tatuttup parunkal
